heading: Today
text: Mostly cloudy, except partly cloudy southeast. Scattered showers of morning rain or light wintry mix near and north or Route 2; then scattered afternoon rain or mountain snow showers. Highs from the upper 30s to mid 40s. South to southwest 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph west of the Greens.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered showers north, diminishing early, and then a chance of snow showers late. Lows from the mid 20s to lower 30s. South to southwest winds gusting to 20 mph early, then becoming west to northwest 5 to 10 mph overnight.

heading: Saturday
text: Decreasing clouds, except mostly cloudy in the northern mountains, with a chance of a flurry. Highs in the low to mid 30s north, upper 30s to mid 40s south. North to northwest winds 5 to 15 mph.
